scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix ./src/server && mkdir ./src/server/public && npm install --prefix ./src/server/frontEnd && npm run --prefix ./src/server build
scripts.prepare: cd ./src/server && npm i && cd frontEnd && npm i && cd .. && npm run build && npm run generate-config && cd ../.. && echo 'Now fill /src/server/config.json or set environmental variables'
scripts.prepare-dev: cd ./src/server && npm i && cd frontEnd && npm i && cd .. && npm run build-dev && npm run generate-config && cd ../.. && echo 'Now fill /src/server/config.json or set environmental variables'
